"A.P.241/9/23/11:00":
"……よし、これなら行ける！
<%me>！
マトイ！\u3000あと少しだ！"

"このまま押し切って……
あの人を、助けるんだ！"

"We've locked onto [Persona]'s
signature! It's all in your hands,
now!"

"Space-time manipulation!?
Is it trying to escape somewhere!?
Where's it fleeing to!?"

"Energy readings have...
disappeared! Energy patterns...
Where'd they go?! What? What? Whaaat?!"

"Calm down, Xiera.
Readings have dropped. We... we lost them."
